yaml.title: Data reporting
yaml.subtitle: ...or the empirical spine of investigative reporting

markdown.markdown:
Welcome to our data reporting course for the masters' students in the Cronkite School’s Masters program in investigative journalism. . It’s time for your journey through what I’m calling “Empirical Journalism”, or the spine of many invstigative stories. I’m looking forward to a productive and lively semester!

--- Sarah Cohen, Professor and Knight Chair in Journalism

I'll put updates here when needed, but all important updates will come via Slack in the #dj-announcements channel. Be sure to set it up for alerts.
